Back to Claude Debussy

Claude Debussy

Humoresque en forme de valse (Joachim Raff)

1893 · Lesure2003 appendix 3 · Lesure1977 appendix 3

This is an arrangement of Joachim Raff’s Humoreske in Walzerform (op. 159), originally written for piano duet.

Duration: 10'

Difficulty: 3
